articles.author: Ali Asgary, Professor, Disaster & Emergency Management, Faculty of Liberal Arts & Professional Studies & Director, CIFAL York, York University, Canada
articles.title: Vancouver SUV attack exposes crowd management falldowns and casts a pall on Canada’s election
